lead_paragraph: A former Blackwater Worldwide security contractor found guilty last year for his role in a deadly Baghdad shooting has appealed his murder conviction, saying the case against him was vindictive and that prosecutors were "determined to win at all costs."

headline.main: Ex-Blackwater Security Contractor Appeals Murder Conviction
headline.print_headline: Ex-Blackwater Security Contractor Appeals Murder Conviction
